title: My First Blog
body: This is my first ever blog post.
author: Pratham

title: My Location
body: I am from India. It gets super hot in the summers, but the food is totally worth it.
author: Pratham

title: College Life
body: I am a student of Chemical Engineering at IIT Kharagpur. The campus is huge and sometimes I get lost (literally).
author: Pratham

title: React is Weird
body: At first, React looked like alien code. But after a few tutorials, it started making sense. Still, I forget to close my tags sometimes.
author: Manav

title: Late Night Coding
body: Why do bugs only show up at 2am? Also, why do I only feel like coding at 2am?
author: Khushank

title: Tea or Coffee?
body: I like tea. But sometimes, coffee is the only way to survive morning classes.
author: Kartik

title: Random Thoughts
body: Why do we park on driveways and drive on parkways? If you know, let me know.
author: Krishna

title: Favorite Movie
body: I can watch Interstellar a hundred times and still not get bored. The soundtrack is epic.
author: Anshuman

title: Coding Playlist
body: Lo-fi beats are my go-to for coding. Sometimes I just vibe and forget to code.
author: Manav

title: Future Plans
body: No idea what the future holds, but I hope it involves less debugging and more pizza.
author: Kartik
